Products


Product Options
Additional Options

2 min
overview & purpose you can add one more additional option for the product apart from size, every product has some additional features available these features vary from product to product each additional option will help customers choose the best available version of the product examples of additional options can be paper type, lamination options, binding style, etc configuration add options to add a new additional option, click on the ‘ add ’ button from the product option docid\ c isaxsonfgrtct4c9rrc tab
